title: Work Experience
description: My professional journey through different companies

songs.title: Software Engineer at Opener.
songs.description: Client-facing features, data ingestion, backened development
songs.languages: TypeScript, React, Node.js, GraphQL, SQL, APIs
accomplishments: Built a TypeScript/React bulk-upload system supporting unlimited store ingestion via BullMQ background jobs and Hasura GraphQL APIs. Implemented a Google Places‚Äìdriven parsing pipeline to enrich CSV uploads and fully automate store onboarding.

Built a TypeScript-based activity timeline that centralizes all client interactions‚Äîincluding emails, shipping status updates, stage transitions, and sales-agent notes‚Äîoffering a clear, end-to-end view of the prospecting and ordering proces for each store.

Developed the handoff/takeover system that transfers ownership of sales leads between agents and clients. Implemented automated emails, database updates, and the company‚Äôs first client-facing CRM tools for managing lead statuses.
Redesigned the user settings page with OpenAI-driven custom sales emails, configurable follow-up schedules backed by email queues, and stronger validation and error handling for required fields.

songs.title: Machine Learning Engineer at MissingWealth
songs.technologies: Google Cloud Platform, Vertex AI, Gemini
accomplishments: Deployed a GCP ETL pipeline (Cloud Storage + Python + Vertex AI) that processed and cleaned 50k+ emails for automated triage.
Built a Gemini-driven zero-/few-shot classifier categorizing emails into four outcomes (Record Found, No Record, More Action Required, Inconclusive) with F1 > 0.90.
Performed confusion matrix analysis and prompt refinement to improve model robustness.
Automated the majority of email triage workflows, reducing manual review effort and improving processing consistency.

songs.title: Data Scientist at RBC
songs.description: Conversational data analysis, machine learning and classfication models
accomplishments: Designed and deployed a production ETL workflow (Python + internal APIs + Postgres) to ingest millions of conversational utterances from RBC‚Äôs virtual assistant platform.
Ran BERTopic models with K-Means and HDBSCAN to discover latent conversational topics behind unhandled bot queries, surfacing recurring failure patterns.
Automated topic summarization and data augmentation using OpenAI GPT-3.5 to produce high-quality candidate intents and training examples for model retraining.
Containerized pipelines and deployed on Helios, supporting scheduled runs and reproducible ML environments for ongoing conversation-quality monitoring.

songs.title: Data Analyst at RBC
accomplishments: Automated Excel-based processes using Python, pandas, and scheduled scripts, enabling reproducible and error-free workforce tracking workflows.
Created parameterized SQL models and Superset datasets to support self-serve BI, reducing ad-hoc SQL requests and standardizing metric definitions across teams.
Developed data validation frameworks with cross-table checks, anomaly rules, and reconciliation logic to maintain high data integrity across 10k+ records.
Optimized SQL queries and Superset visualizations to reduce load times and improve usability for analytics stakeholders.

songs.title: Data Governance Analyst at Toyota Canada
accomplishments: Delivered data quality and reporting insights by querying, cleansing, and joining enterprise data across multiple SQL tables for various teams.

Enhanced an internal Python-based r√©sum√© parsing tool by optimizing text-classification logic, redesigning the weighting system, and enabling customizable keyword weights for hiring managers‚Äîresulting in more accurate and intuitive candidate scoring.

Implemented a real-time weather analytics dashboard using Power BI, a Python ETL script, and REST API ingestion; automated extraction, transformation, and loading into a SQL database to support operational decision-making.
